export const generateChartData = days => {
  const data = [];
  const basePrice = 100;
  for (let i = 0; i < days; i++) {
    const date = new Date();
    date.setDate(date.getDate() - (days - i));
    data.push({
      date: date.toLocaleDateString(),
      price: basePrice + Math.random() * 20 - 10,
      volume: Math.floor(Math.random() * 1000000) + 500000
    });
  }
  return data;
};

];

export const generateChartData = (days: number) => {
  const data = [];
  const basePrice = 100;
  
  for (let i = 0; i < days; i++) {
    const date = new Date();
    date.setDate(date.getDate() - (days - i));
    
    data.push({
      date: date.toLocaleDateString(),
      price: basePrice + Math.random() * 20 - 10,
      volume: Math.floor(Math.random() * 1000000) + 500000
    });
  }
  
  return data;
};
